definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The rear seats are extremely comfortable and the L-shaped headrests improve the driver's rear view visibility.
sentences.chinese: 后座非常舒适的L型头枕改善司机的后视能见度。
轻低能见度的反光元素。

sentences.english: Reflective detailing allows for visibility in low-light conditions.
sentences.chinese: 反光详细说明允许在弱光条件下的能见度。

sentences.english: An all-LED blue light is housed in the device, offering visibility at long distances.
sentences.chinese: 设备上有个全LED蓝光灯，增大长距离下的能见度。

sentences.english: In the most-seriously affected areas in Shandong province, visibility was limited to just a few meters.
sentences.chinese: 在最严重影响了山东省的地区，能见度只限于数米。

sentences.english: The choice of sites depends on the wind, tidal currents and visibility .
sentences.chinese: 泊岸地的选择取决于风速，浪潮的高低和能见度。

sentences.english: The visibility of racing pigeons undoubtedly is one of the biggest taboo.
sentences.chinese: 这样的能见度对赛鸽来讲无疑是一种最大的忌讳。

sentences.english: When officials opened the Olympic Village over the weekend, visibility was sharply limited by clotted skies.
sentences.chinese: 当上周末奥运村开村时，浓云造成能见度急剧降低。

sentences.english: Glass lenses have the best visual quality.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃镜拥有最好的能见度。

sentences.english: And what if you don’t have any visibility yet?
sentences.chinese: 那么假如你根本在网上还没有什么能见度呢？

sentences.english: The visibility in this area is up to 12 meters deep in sunny days.
sentences.chinese: 天气晴朗时分，千岛湖湖水的能见度可达到12米。

sentences.english: Because of the fog, visibility was drastically reduced.
sentences.chinese: 由于大雾，能见度遽烈的减低。

sentences.english: The mixture of pollutants responsible includes very fine particles and photochemical gases.
sentences.chinese: 能见度下降的元凶包括超细微粒及光化烟雾。

sentences.english: Recycled PVC weights provide a high visibility, non-slip secure base that does not penetrate the roof membrane.
sentences.chinese: 再生聚氯乙烯保证了高能见度，防滑安全。

sentences.english: Main compartment has a D-shaped zipper flap opening with visibility of divided interior.
sentences.chinese: 主隔间有能见度分为室内的D形拉链瓣开放。
